title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embedding documents, and pulling models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for retrieval chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, managing models, and multi-user workspaces; renamed to ‘Open WebUI’.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go—browse, pull, and chat with models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion service powered by Ollama models and LSP.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template that combines Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for question-answering over PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread-based chats.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama server and CLI, enabling reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to spin up GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and model warm-up.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Socket Mode to reply in threads with Ollama models and supports file snippets.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama and demonstrates RAG and memory.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for .NET 6+ with strongly-typed requests/responses and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as generators and embedders for production pipelines.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to horizontally scale Ollama models across a Ray cluster.
